text_block_list.name: Satake Mei
text_block_list.text: Have you ever tried to reach for the stars?

text_block_list.name: Satake Mei
text_block_list.text:
The zealous passion found 
on the other side of the sea?

text_block_list.name: Satake Mei
text_block_list.text:
To adorn the pages of history as one 
of the greats? To be spoken of in grand 
and glorious manner?

text_block_list.name: Satake Mei
text_block_list.text: To run a race chasing the ultimate glory?

text_block_list.name: Satake Mei
text_block_list.text:
To obtain all that comes with victory 
at the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe?

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
……Gratitude! I thank you for 
walking this path with us.

text_block_list.name: Satake Mei
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha, come on, no need to be so formal 
with me now. I said it before, didn't I?

text_block_list.name: Satake Mei
text_block_list.text: Me, I've always been a dreamer.

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
…! So you were indeed. 
…I am the same way.

text_block_list.name: Venus Paques
text_block_list.text: By my victory, I shall grant you courage.

text_block_list.name: Rigantona
text_block_list.text: Let us partake in a thrilling contest.

text_block_list.name: Satake Mei
text_block_list.text: Unleash the desires that burn within.

Reach for the stars. 
Project l'Arc
